title: Bespoked 2024: 7 of the Best Hand Made All-Road, CX and Gravel Bikes
content:
What do a 36er Titanium Gravel Bike, a Scotland-made boutique one-off aluminum CX bike, a Space Cake All-Road Bike and a bike made of ash tree wood have in common? All were at the 2024 Bespoked Show at Victoria Baths.

Read the full article at Bespoked 2024: 7 of the Best Hand Made All-Road, CX and Gravel Bikes on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
